original_text: If a righteous person stops doing good things and he does bad things instead, he will die. Yes, he will die because of the wrong things that he has done.
korean_text: 만일 의인이 그 공의를 떠나 죄악을 행하고 그로 말미암아 죽으면 그 행한 죄악으로 말미암아 죽는 것이요

sentences.original_text: If a righteous person stops doing good things
and he does bad things instead
because of the wrong things that he has done
